org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic
Class AbstractEventBusinessLogic

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic.AbstractBusinessLogic
      org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic.AbstractEventBusinessLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractEventFinderBusinessLogic
public abstract class AbstractEventBusinessLogic
extends AbstractBusinessLogic

Class containing Helper Methods. Helper Methods Query EPCIS for BizLocations, ReadPoints and ReadTimes.

Author:
Mathias Mueller mathias.mueller(at)unifr.ch
